Channel¶

Module containing the functions that cover the channel characteristics.

Additive White Gaussian Noise¶

channel.AWGN(IFsig, SNR)

Adds noise to the IF signal based on the proposed SNR.

Parameters

  • IFsig (1D array of floats) – IF modulated signal.

  • SNR (float) – Signal to noise ratio in dB.

Returns

IF_n – IF signal with noise based on the SNR.

Return type

1D array of floats

import numpy as np

def AWGN(IFsig, SNR):
   dP = np.zeros(len(IFsig))
   P = 0

   for i in range(len(IFsig)):
      dP[i] = abs(IFsig[i])**2
      P = P + dP[i]

   P = P/len(IFsig)
   gamma = 10**(SNR/10)
   N0 = P/gamma
   n = ((N0/2)**(0.5))*np.random.standard_normal(len(IFsig))
   IF_n = np.zeros(len(IFsig))

   for i in range(len(IFsig)):
      IF_n[i] = IFsig[i] + n[i]

   return(IF_n)
